review_data.title: My favourite Italian restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: Despite the very Swiss name, this place offers honest and down-to-earth Italian food prepared fresh with high quality ingredients, including great pizzas and pasta dishes but also changing menus that are often more traditional fare seldomly found outside of Italy. All of that is served...More

review_data.title: Best Pizza in Town!!
review_data.content: Sehr nettes Team das alle Wünsche erfüllt. Das Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis ist super, vorallem die Mittagsmenues sind sehr preiswert.

review_data.title: Die Pizza war super
review_data.content: Toller Service, essen war top, alles frisch. Der neue Besitzer hat eine tolle italienische Mannschaft. Gute Weinberatung.

review_data.title: Dinner
review_data.content: It was much more than just nice. Rather a home away from home. Food & Drinks excellent, and given that it is Zurich, rreally moderate!

review_data.title: very caring staff
review_data.content: This place is very cosy and stylish. The service is very friendly and fast. The dishes are delicious and portins are big (rather unual for Zürich). There is also enough space and it is not loud (there is no music that I appreciate a lot)

review_data.title: Nice outside seating - good food
review_data.content: Eglihof does not look spectacular from outside. It is right at Hohlstrasse where there is a lot of traffic. However, their Biergarten is pretty nice and sunny in the afternoon. The food they serve is good with changing specialities every day. They serve mainly Swiss...More
